  O z x

  P v x

subsection \<open> Disjointness \<close>
lemma disjoint_implies_distinct: "\<not> O x y \<Longrightarrow> x \<noteq> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> O x y \<Longrightarrow> x \<noteq> y
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> O x y \<Longrightarrow> x \<noteq> y
assume "\<not> O x y"

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> O x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> O x y \<Longrightarrow> x \<noteq> y
show "x \<noteq> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<noteq> y
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = y \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "x = y"

proof (state)
this:
  x = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = y \<Longrightarrow> False
hence "\<not> O y y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> O y y
using `\<not> O x y`

proof (prove)
using this:
  x = y
  \<not> O x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> O y y
by (rule subst)

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> O y y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = y \<Longrightarrow> False
thus "False"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> O y y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
using overlap_reflexivity

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> O y y
  O ?x ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  x \<noteq> y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

 1. \<not> P x y

proof (state)

 1. P x y \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "P x y"

proof (state)
this:
  P x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x y \<Longrightarrow> False
hence "O x y"

proof (prove)
using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

this:

goal (1 subgoal):

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> P x y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma disjoint_demonotonicity: "P x y \<Longrightarrow> \<not> O z y \<Longrightarrow> \<not> O z x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P x y; \<not> O z y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<not> O z x
proof -
